title: Banned?
body: I was wondering how I got banned but the people inting inside the game didn't... I mean i flammed once but cmon.

replies.body: im too got banned because i insult people who feed game 19 times............... is nonsense peoples who trol games must baned not peoples who lost stats because noobs go rankeds and trol.... joking on u and u can say anithing because for insult u got ban buit i can creat new account and troll all games................... peoples insult me when i report and good players got bans for insult is nonsens mods pls help me.................................................................... im lost acount because i hate feeders who trols games  every one hate whem................................. whach stats befor ban for insult

Punishments placed on accounts don't entail anything that someone else did. The punishment is placed due to what that person said or did, regardless of what anyone else did. You can be the owner of your actions. If someone was inting, the best way to get back at them is to report them so that we can handle it.
